title: Ep 55: Small businesses in Small Packages with Julie Schecter
itunes:title: Ep 55: Small businesses in Small Packages with Julie Schecter
itunes:subtitle: Julie Schechter created Small Packages when she realized that there was no fool-proof way to send something cute and curated to a faraway friend. Now that all we HAVE in this world are our faraway friends, Small Packages came in prettyyyyy handy this y...
description:
Julie Schechter created Small Packages when she realized that there was no fool-proof way to send something cute and curated to a faraway friend. Now that all we HAVE in this world are our faraway friends, Small Packages came in prettyyyyy handy this year (especially for Caroline, who ordered like, 7 boxes). This episode also covers CHIC NIGHTLIGHTS and tiny jars of caramel from Fat Toad.


(Follow Gee Thanks! on Insta: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod! I wanna see you there! And on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/groups/geethanks)


THE GEE THANKS GIFT GUIDES ARE HERE!: https://www.geethanksjustboughtit.com/gtjbi 


Mentioned On This Episode:

  • Small Packages: www.smallpackages.co (it’s too late for holiday orders to make it by Christmas, but everyone loves getting a mid-winter box...especially when you can’t leave the house). Circle back on it!
  • Fat Toad Caramel: https://fave.co/2Kes9Et
  • Bonashi Night Light (On Sale!): https://amzn.to/2Wguf9H
  • Toilet Bowl LED Light: https://amzn.to/341kyQE 


Visit www.geethanksjustboughtit.com for even more recs and shop the Gee Thanks! Store: https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit


As always, reach me at Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com, @geethanksjustboughtitpod on Instagram, or leave me a message at 424-245-0736. 



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
